class.name: GitHubIssueTracker
class.description: Project feature enabling integration with GitHub issue tracker

function.name: githubIssues
function.description: Adds a project features enabling integration with GitHub issue tracker

option.name: usernameAndPassword
option.description: Authentication via login/password is deprecated by GitHub. We highly recommend that you authenticate with access tokens instead.

param.name: pattern
param.description: Issues ID pattern. Use regex syntax, e.g. '#(\d+)'.

example.description: It is not recommended to store secure values such as tokens directly in the DSL code, see [Managing Tokens](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/storing-project-settings-in-version-control.html#Managing+Tokens) section of our documentation.
